profileAlternative.name: Susan Sun
profileAlternative.headline: Freelance Data Person
profileAlternative.summary:
I want to make a statistically significant difference in the world.

I have more than four years of data freelancing experience, with expertise in:

- design-based strategic data consulting for start-ups
- data-related training and education
- conscientious application of data science and engineering for business
- pro bono data work for social change

positions.title: Lecturer
positions.description: I teach APAN5800 (Storytelling with Data) at the Columbia's Applied Analytics Master's program

positions.title: Fractional Vice President of Data Science

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York
University of Pennsylvania - The Wharton School

given.text: Susan is an expert in modelling using statistical techniques and has tons of experience in code refinement. Excellent combination of technical skills and business acumen. I've worked with Susan on many projects. Her level of Professionalism is outstanding.

Susan has a deep understanding of statistical methodologies and data science which she can translate into business insights.
I worked with Susan on several projects. She's a great team member and has the ability to wear different hats; formulating hypotheses, writing data requirements, coordinating activities, developing predictive models and communicating results.
I recommend Susan on her future pursuits. See less

received.text:
It was my pleasure to invite Matt to come talk at our NYDSSG meetup at Tumblr on data-driven storytelling and building modern reporting products.  Matt's presentation is informative, thoughtfully crafted, and easy to understand.  I'm a fan of the way he engaged the audience during his talk and weaved in real-life examples to bring the subject matter to life.  I would strongly recommend Matt as a speaker for any data related convention, meetups or conferences, and I would be more than happy if Matt chooses to come back and speak at our meetup again.  


... See more

I had the opportunity to work with Eri on several projects at Thomson Reuters.  Eri is hands down the best teammate to have on a complex and difficult project.  She is deeply analytical, attentive to detail, and extremely thorough in her understanding of the business and analytical methods.  She has a unique combination of impeccable personal work ethic and knowledgeable management style that makes her the ideal team player to have on any analytical team.
